description.narrative: The overall development objective of the project is to improve mobility on selected main corridors of center city Taiyuan, for people and freight in a safe and efficient manner. To this end, the project will monitor the following on selected main corridors: (i) travel times for road users; (ii) quality and use of public transport services; and (iii) road fatality rates. The project will also strengthen capacity for project implementation, traffic management and public transport.

condition.narrative: Shanxi shall cause Taiyuan Municipality to prepare and furnish to the Bank by April 15 in each calendar year a proposed annualworkplan.
Shanxi shall cause TaiyuanMunicipality to implement the RAP, the RPF, and the EMP, all in a manner andsubstance satisfactory tothe Bank.
Shanxi shall maintain a Provincial Project Leading Group. Shanxi shall cause Taiyuan Municipality to maintain a Project LeadingGroup.
Shanxi shall provide funds, facilities,services and other resources required for the Project.
The Borrower shall monitor and evaluate the progress of the Project and prepareProject Reports...on the basis of the indicators...
